name: OpenAI
description: OpenAI's GPT models including GPT-4, GPT-3.5-turbo

models.name: gpt-4
models.description: Most capable model, best for complex tasks

models.name: gpt-4-turbo
models.description: Faster and more efficient version of GPT-4

models.name: gpt-3.5-turbo
models.description: Fast and efficient model for most tasks

registration_guide: 访问 [OpenAI Platform](https://platform.openai.com) 注册账户，在 API Keys 页面创建密钥。新用户获得免费额度。
notes: 支持 GPT-4、GPT-3.5-turbo 等模型。付费用户享有更高的速率限制。详见 [OpenAI 定价](https://openai.com/pricing)。
